content.rendered:
If you are looking for a ceiling solution for your office space, Armstrong false ceiling is the ideal choice. There are different kinds of false ceiling available in the market. The style and color options available are also quite a lot. Choose a ceiling which goes with overall look of your room. It should give an impression of space and openness. False ceiling if chosen appropriately look very impressive. They in fact enhance the overall look of your room.

Need for Armstrong False Ceiling solution

For your commercial space you can choose to go in for acoustical ceiling. The benefit of acoustical ceiling is that they minimize noise. You can decide upon sound absorption as well as sound blocking for any space. The Armstrong acoustical ceiling portfolio encompasses wide array of material such as mineral fiber, perforated metal, fiberglass and perforated wood. Colors such as bright whites, cool metals and warm woods present the design flexibility along with right acoustical performance which you require in your commercial space.

Other Benefits of Armstrong False Ceilings

  • They are extremely easy to install and help to hide the clutter of all wirings, ducts and other networking cables.
  • They are resistant to moisture, bacteria, mildew and sagging.
  • Armstrong false ceilings are fire retardant and meet all the industry norms for flame spread ratings.
  • They optimize the light reflection and thus diminish the need for any additional lighting. As a result, they are highly energy efficient.

Choose Us

Decor enterprise offers a range of decorative solutions that will amaze you. With our huge catalogue range, you will get spoilt for choice. So, go ahead choose your Armstrong False ceiling solution with us and see your space transform into something fabulous.

Know about Armstrong Board for false ceiling design.
